net.proteusframework.email

Class EmailTemplateContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.email.EmailTemplateContext

  • public final class EmailTemplateContext
extends Object
    Context information when operating on EmailTemplates.

    All required properties must be set as constructor parameters. Optional properties can be set with setters / with methods.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • EmailTemplateContext

        public EmailTemplateContext(CmsSite site,
                    Locale locale,
                    TimeZone timeZone,
                    EmailTemplateContext.Mode mode)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        site - the site.
        locale - the locale.
        timeZone - the time zone.
        mode - the mode. Use PROCESSING if you are sending email.

      • getRecipientAttribute

        @Nullable
public EmailTemplateRecipient getRecipientAttribute()
        Get the optional recipient attribute if it is set. This is commonly copied to the DomainModelContext by the EmailConfigType during EmailTemplate processing. See the contract of your particular EmailConfigType.
        Returns:
        the recipient attribute. May be null.

        public EmailTemplateContext withAttribute(Object key,
                                 @Nullable
                                 Object value)
        Set an optional attribute to use during processing. The default is null.
        Parameters:

        value - the value.

      • withDomainModelContextInitializer

        public EmailTemplateContext withDomainModelContextInitializer(Function<com.i2rd.domainmodel.context.DomainModelContext,com.i2rd.domainmodel.context.DomainModelContext> initializer)
        Set the DomainModelContext initializer. Optional Function to initialize the context (per recipient). The Function can modify the context and return it or return a different context. The Function must never return null.
        Parameters:
        initializer - the initializer.
        Returns:
        this.

      • withHostname

        public EmailTemplateContext withHostname(CmsHostname hostname)
        Set an optional hostname to use during processing. The default is to use CmsSite.getDefaultHostname().
        Parameters:
        hostname - the hostname.
        Returns:
        this.

      • withPrincipal

        public EmailTemplateContext withPrincipal(net.proteusframework.users.model.Principal principal)
        Set an optional principal to use during processing. This is the principal that is interacting with the email template from the template processor's point of view. Sometimes this will be the same as the recipient. Sometimes this will be the originator / initiator. The default is null.
        Parameters:
        principal - the principal.
        Returns:
        this.

      • withRecipientAttribute

        public EmailTemplateContext withRecipientAttribute(EmailTemplateRecipient recipient)
        Set an optional recipient attribute to use during processing. The default is null. The key is EmailTemplateContext.StandardAttribute.RECIPIENT.
        Parameters:
        recipient - the recipient.
        Returns:
        this.
        See Also:
        getRecipientAttribute()

      • withRecipientAttribute

        public EmailTemplateContext withRecipientAttribute(net.proteusframework.users.model.Principal value)
                                            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Set an optional recipient attribute to use during processing. The default is null. The principal must have an email address. The key is EmailTemplateContext.StandardAttribute.RECIPIENT.
        Parameters:
        value - the principal.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the principal doesn't have an email address.
        See Also:
        getRecipientAttribute()
